DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess change patient 's overall energy level well-being ( quality life ) 8 week dietary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Med Diet Prevention Metabolic Syndrome Men Undergoing Androgen Deprivation Therapy Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective : To assess change follow measurement 8 week follow Mediterranean diet -- LDL , HDL , TG , FBS , creatinine , serum testosterone , triglyceride , serum insulin , CRP , 1bs , Waist circumference , blood pressure , body weight
DOC.criteria: Histologically document carcinoma prostate On treatment androgen deprivation therapy least 3 month Required laboratory value : Serum creatinine le 2.5 Triglycerides < 300 Fasting glucose < 126 Testosterone level < 50 No diabetes mellitus ( Type 1 2 ) No renal failure ( Serum creatinine > 2.5 ) No active cardiac disease history myocardial infarction/stroke within last 12 month , recurrent unstable angina , uncontrolled/unstable arrhythmia , uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 160 , diastolic blood pressure > 100 ) No severe peripheral vascular disease No commencement lipid lower agent within 8 week enrollment study change dose throughout study
